data.eml:eml: Taxonomic review of the genus Ammophilomima (Diptera: Asilidae: Leptogastrinae) in Japan

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kuroda, Keita, Ohishi, Hisashi (2019): Taxonomic review of the genus Ammophilomima (Diptera: Asilidae: Leptogastrinae) in Japan. Zootaxa 4646 (2): 357-368, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4646.2.10
